name: Classic Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 190°C (375°F).
Cream butter and sugars, then add eggs and vanilla.
Mix in flour and chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls onto a baking sheet.
Bake for 10-12 minutes.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Sauté onions and carrots until soft.
Brown the ground beef in a pan.
Add tomatoes and simmer for 20 minutes.
Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Serve sauce over pasta.

name: Greek Salad
instructions: Dice cucumbers and tomatoes.
Cut feta into cubes.
Combine all ingredients in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil.
Toss gently and serve.

name: Banana Bread
instructions: Mash bananas in a bowl.
Mix flour, sugar, and melted butter.
Fold in bananas and walnuts.
Bake at 180°C (350°F) for 50 minutes.
Cool before slicing.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Heat oil in a wok or pan.
Stir-fry vegetables for 5 minutes.
Add tofu and soy sauce.
Cook for another 3 minutes and serve.

name: Pancakes
instructions: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
Whisk in milk and eggs.
Melt butter and add to batter.
Cook on a greased pan until bubbles form.
Flip and cook for another minute.

name: Chicken Curry
instructions: Brown chicken in a pan and set aside.
Sauté onions until translucent.
Add curry paste and cook for 1 minute.
Return chicken to pan, add coconut milk and potatoes.
Simmer for 25 minutes until chicken is cooked through.

name: Omelette
instructions: Whisk eggs with milk and salt.
Melt butter in a non-stick pan.
Pour egg mixture into pan.
Add cheese and mushrooms when eggs begin to set.
Fold omelette in half and garnish with chives.

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Brown ground beef in a skillet.
Add taco seasoning and water, simmer for 5 minutes.
Warm taco shells according to package.
Assemble tacos with beef, lettuce, and cheese.
Serve with salsa and sour cream.

name: Apple Pie
instructions: Peel and slice apples, mix with sugar and cinnamon.
Line pie dish with bottom crust.
Add apple mixture and dot with butter.
Cover with top crust and seal edges.
Bake at 200°C (400°F) for 45 minutes.
